page.title: 04Ghost at the White Hart Inn.
page.content: John Ferney staggered up the stairs of the White Hart Inn, clinging to the banisters and singing drunken songs.This was the result of consuming five pints of beer at the tavern. He finally reached the top and lay exhausted for a full ten minutes. Then he crawled along the landing, turned the knob of his door and crashed out on his four-poster where he fell asleep almost immediately. He awoke with his flesh creeping. The room felt strangely cold and the blackness was so dense that he could not see his hand in front of his face. For a moment he thought he heard an eerie moan which made the skin on his back prickle. Imagination, he thought. It must be. Suddenly he felt the bedclothes being ripped off him. He screamed,as he saw bright lights whizzing round him.
